long_description: The elegant Electra Verse 24D bike makes it easy to get going on your ride, thanks to 24 gears and plenty of style. Aluminum frame features internal cable routing for clean lines and protection from road grime; step-through frame makes it easy to mount and dismount bike. Shimano trigger shifters control the Shimano derailleurs for easy, precise shifts between the 24 gear combinations. Mixed Tread tires supply great versatility, providing smooth-rolling performance on roads, paths and packed gravel. Convenient platform pedals do not require special shoes. Specs on the Electra Verse 24D bike are subject to change.
short_description: The elegant Electra Verse 24D bike makes it easy to get going on your ride, thanks to 24 gears and plenty of style.
